title: Portfolio
desc: My portfolio website built to showcase my projects, experiences, and skills.

title: Watchlist
desc: A full-stack movie recommendation app. I trained a collaborative filtering machine learning model to generate recommendations using cosine similarity and matrix factorization. A Flask REST API hosted on Ubuntu serves the model recommendations to a React client.
